From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

Catalan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin obtinēre; adapted to inherited tenir.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): (Central) [up.təˈni]
  • IPA(key): (Balearic) [op.təˈni]
  • IPA(key): (Valencia) [op.teˈniɾ]
  • Audio (Catalonia):(file)

Verb

[edit]

obtenir (first-person singular present obtinc, first-person singular preterite obtinguí, past participle obtingut); root stress: (Central, Valencia, Balearic) /e/

  1. to obtain, to get

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of obtenir (third conjugation, without -eix-, irregular, with velar infix)

gerund obtenint
past participle masculine feminine
singular obtingut obtinguda
plural obtinguts obtingudes

preterite obtinguí obtingueres obtingué obtinguérem obtinguéreu obtingueren
conditional obtindria obtindries obtindria obtindríem obtindríeu obtindrien
subjunctive jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres

Related terms

[edit]
  • obtenció
  • obtenidor
  • obteniment

Further reading

[edit]
  • “obtenir”, in Diccionari de la llengua catalana [Dictionary of the Catalan Language] (in Catalan), second edition, Institute of Catalan Studies [Catalan: Institut d'Estudis Catalans], April 2007
  • “obtenir”, in Gran Diccionari de la Llengua Catalana, Grup Enciclopèdia Catalana, 2025
  • “obtenir” in Diccionari normatiu valencià, Acadèmia Valenciana de la Llengua.
  • “obtenir” in Diccionari català-valencià-balear, Antoni Maria Alcover and Francesc de Borja Moll, 1962.

French

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Inherited from Middle French, from Old French obtenir, borrowed from Latin obtinēre, with conjugation based on tenir.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /ɔp.tə.niʁ/
  • Audio:(file)
  • Audio (France (Vosges)):(file)
  • Audio (France (Lyon)):(file)
  • Audio (France (Somain)):(file)

Verb

[edit]

obtenir

  1. to get, to obtain

Conjugation

[edit]

This is a verb in a group of -ir verbs. All verbs ending in -tenir, such as contenir and détenir, are conjugated this way. Such verbs are the only verbs whose the past historic and subjunctive imperfect endings do not start in one of these thematic vowels (-a-, -i-, -u-).

Conjugation of obtenir (see also Appendix:French verbs)
infinitive simple obtenir
compound avoir + past participle
present participle or gerund1 simple obtenant
/ɔp.tə.nɑ̃/

1 The French gerund is usable only with the preposition en.
2 In less formal writing or speech, these tenses may be found to have been replaced in the following way:
past historic → present perfect
past anterior → pluperfect
imperfect subjunctive → present subjunctive
pluperfect subjunctive → past subjunctive

(Christopher Kendris [1995], Master the Basics: French, pp. 77, 78, 79, 81).

Further reading

[edit]
  • “obtenir”, in Trésor de la langue française informatisé [Digitized Treasury of the French Language], 2012.

Anagrams

[edit]
  • broient, robinet

Middle French

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From Old French obtenir.

Verb

[edit]

obtenir

  1. to obtain

Descendants

[edit]
  • English: obtain
  • French: obtenir

Old French

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

First known attestation 1283,[1] borrowed from Latin obtineō, obtinēre, with conjugation modeled on tenir.

Verb

[edit]

obtenir

  1. to obtain

Conjugation

[edit]

This verb conjugates as a third-group verb. This verb has a stressed present stem obtien distinct from the unstressed stem obten, as well as other irregularities. Old French conjugation varies significantly by date and by region. The following conjugation should be treated as a guide.

    Conjugation of obtenir (see also Appendix:Old French verbs)
simple compound
infinitive obtenir avoir obtenu
gerund en obtenant gerund of avoir + past participle
present participle obtenant
past participle obtenu
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative jo tu il nos vos il
simple
tenses 		present obtieng, obtien obtiens obtient obtenons obtenez obtienent
imperfect obtenoie, obteneie obtenoies, obteneies obtenoit, obteneit obteniiens, obteniens obteniiez, obteniez obtenoient, obteneient
preterite obtin obtenis obtint obtenimes obtenistes obtindrent, obtinrent
future obtendrai obtendras obtendra obtendrons obtendroiz, obtendreiz, obtendrez obtendront
conditional obtendroie, obtendreie obtendroies, obtendreies obtendroit, obtendreit obtendriiens, obtendriens obtendriiez, obtendriez obtendroient, obtendreient
compound
tenses 		present perfect present tense of avoir + past participle
pluperfect imperfect tense of avoir + past participle
past anterior preterite tense of avoir + past participle
future perfect future tense of avoir + past participle
conditional perfect conditional tense of avoir + past participle
subjunctive que jo que tu qu’il que nos que vos qu’il
simple
tenses 		present obtiegne obtiegnes obtiegne obtiegniens, obtiegnons obtiegniez obtiegnent
imperfect obtenisse obtenisses obtenist obtenissons, obtenissiens obtenissoiz, obtenissez, obtenissiez obtenissent
compound
tenses 		past present subjunctive of avoir + past participle
pluperfect imperfect subjunctive of avoir + past participle
imperative – tu – nos vos –
— obtien — obtenons obtenez —

Descendants

[edit]
  • English: obtain
  • Middle French: obtenir
    • French: obtenir
